channel.title: Paypal
channel.description: I have a paypal account and it is now limited and I don't know what to do. Please tell me how to unlimite my account. Do it like steps... :) Thanks, Tony ;D

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

gangsta tony:

I try doing that, but it won’t let me :’(

It don’t let you? because you don’t have? lol in the bottom it says what credit card’s it except , visa but you cannot have visa since your probably -18 ask your parents if the have one of the credit cards that’s aloud . just add them its explained on the paypal forum and help desk, If you fail lol then Ur a noob

Read full topic

[/quote]Lol. True, I think they have a Support/FAQ’s section? Am I right?

They also have live support[/quote]Wow, That just makes it all the better for tony. And funnier xD!

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

They only send payments if you added your bank from a check. If you add a credit card, it only asks you for the card number, the security number, the name on the card, the type. And the date it expires.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Sam_Lake Sam Lake
item.description:
@Sam_Lake wrote:

Add all your bank details to PayPal, then they send you like £0.15 and £0.14 and check your statement/bank payments and enter it on PayPal, where you verify your card.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I was stuck on this step yesterday.

As few people said above, you got to verify it. They will/have sent a deposit to you. To check the deposit, you got to have an internet banking account for you bank. For example my bank is NAB. Once you got all that setup, check your bank statements.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

If you entered correct information about your card and it requires a code I think you will need to go to the bank from where you got the credit/debit card and tell them to check your “payments” and in there they should should find the code it requires you to enter to verify it. Read that 4 months ago idk if it’s still the same.

Read full topic

You need to verify your credit card once you add it.
